text: @Jim_Jordan @realDonaldTrump yelled election as HOAX, Muller as HOAX, FBI as HOAX, COVID-19 as HOAX, murdering US soldiers as HOAX.  What did @GOP do? 🙈🙉🙊 just like what you did in 🤽🏻‍♂️ 🚿 🤼‍♀️, SAD!
